Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.controllers

Class InitialLeader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.controllers.InitialLeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class InitialLeader extends Object implements GUIController
class InitialLeader is the class responsible to show the players the initial Leader Cards that can be chosen in the GUI. It uses FXML files for JavaFX
Author:
Alessio Piovesan
